comments: Paul (OKC) makes marginal contact to Knight's (DET) body after his release and doesn't affect his driving shot attempt.
Gallinari (OKC) and Knight (DET) engage and separate in the post.
Wood (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Snell (DET) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Schroder (OKC).
Wood (DET) makes marginal contact to Gallinari (OKC) as he slightly extends his arms on the pick, but the contact does not dislodge him from his legal guarding position.
Paul (OKC) makes contact to Wood's (DET) arm that dislodges the ball.
Gallinari (OKC) wraps Snell (DET) and affects his FOM after the pick.
Adams (OKC) makes marginal contact by placing his hand on Snell's (DET) shoulder, but immediately slides it off as he cleanly blocks the shot on the driving shot attempt.
Adams (OKC) maintains a legal guarding position on Galloway (DET) and cleanly deflects the pass.
Knight (DET) moves along Paul's (OKC) path and dislodges the ball during his driving shot attempt.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: The ball is dislodged off Paul (OKC) out of bounds.
Wood (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Schroder's (OKC) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Gallinari (OKC) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by McRae (DET) and the contact is marginal.

Gilgeous-Alexander (OKC) has a resting hand on Wood's (DET) shoulder that he slides off as both players go for the rebound.  The contact is marginal and Gilgeous-Alexander makes clean ball contact to dislodge it.
Adams (OKC) cleanly tips the loose ball away from Wood (DET) during the loose ball.
Paul (OKC) goes to, but not through Knight (DET) as he pulls up to change direction.
Wood (DET) makes marginal contact to Gallinari (OKC) as he disengages from the screen.
McRae (DET) commits a take foul on Paul (OKC).
Mykhailiuk (DET) commits a take foul on Schroder (OKC).
Wood (DET) extends beyond his natural screening plane to deliver contact to Schroder's (OKC) back and the contact dislodges him.
All technical fouls are reviewed by League Operations.
